titles.title: Medicaid Estate Recovery Fairness Act of 2018
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to limit estate recovery under Medicaid with respect to newly eligible individuals, and for other purposes.
Medicaid Estate Recovery Fairness Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Medicaid Estate Recovery Fairness Act of 2018
This bill limits the scope of estate recovery under Medicaid with respect to the Medicaid expansion population.
